text:
Harvard released 10 lectures on AI & prompting.

No paywall. For free (I added the links too):

Get all official guides here: https://lnkd.in/eu2mj4aS 

1. Introduction to Generative AI
A step-by-step guide to how gen AI works. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/e9rWNjBE

2. Prompt Engineering 
Get tips to get better results from any model. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/e5nekvS2

3. Beyond Chatbots: System Prompts, RAG
Go deeper than chatbots. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/exsX5tP7

4. CS50x 2025 – Artificial Intelligence Lecture 
Covers neural networks, LLMs, and AI use cases. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/eYg6vdCr

5. CS50 Extension - AI / Prompt Engineering 
Design, test, and improve prompts for any AI tool. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/eJH4DWQR

6. GPT-4: How does it work, & how to build apps? 
A deep dive into GPT-4’s inner workings. 
Video: https://lnkd.in/eeh7QXUM

7. LLMs and the End of Programming 
See why prompt engineering is the new coding. 
Video: https://lnkd.in/e3JbSFi7

8. Generative AI in Teaching & Learning
A full playlist on using AI in education. 
Playlist: https://lnkd.in/erdwPRvu

9. Teaching with AI in the Classroom
A practical guide for teachers and trainers. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/eWXskwWG

10. The Basics of Generative AI 
A simple, no-jargon intro to generative AI. 
Link: https://lnkd.in/eSCJ62Bi
